EBV: Lymphoepithelioma-like carcinoma; Dense lymphoid stroma; Prominent lymphocytic reaction; EBER-ISH positive staining; Pushing tumor margins; Intestinal metaplasia in surrounding mucosa; Lack of severe nuclear atypia; Low lymphovascular invasion.
others: Diffuse infiltration; Signet-ring cells; Linitis plastica appearance; Poor cellular cohesion; Desmoplastic stromal reaction; High nuclear pleomorphism; Prominent nucleoli; Irregular tumor glands; Hyperchromasia; Increased mitotic activity; Tumor heterogeneity;
